e: ￹`tinako~ `sa~`~￺for example * to illustrate * the introductory word in a sentence￻比如，比方，舉例來說，一個句子的導語
￹`Pa~`tinako~`en~ `ta~ `ma~`fana'~ `kako~.￺Use an illustration; then I will understand.￻請你舉例說明我才能明白
d.f: ￹￺to use an illustration to explain￻用例子說明

e: ￹`Adihay~ `ko~ `tinako~ `ni~`~ `Yis~.￺Jesus used a lot of parables￻耶穌用很多比喻
d.f: ￹￺biblical term for parable￻聖經用法指比喻

e: ￹`Ma~`tinako~ `to~ `ako~ `ko~ `ma~`tiraay~ `a~ `pades~.￺I've experienced that kind of trouble.￻我已經體會過那種挫折了
